    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentLoader

        public ContentLoader(android.content.Context context,
                     java.lang.String serviceId,
                     int maxAgeInHours,
                     java.lang.Class<Content> contentClassType,
                     java.lang.String contentType,
                     AppInfraInterface appInfra,
                     int downloadLimit)
        Create a content loader of type Content, loading content from the given service using the given Content class type.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - Id of the service discovery service to download the content from
        maxAgeInHours - maximum age of the content, a refresh is recommended if cached content is older
        contentClassType - type of the content class (use Content.class)
        contentType - name of the content as given in the server JSON structure
        downloadLimit - no of pages that should be downloaded in one attempt. This will override the limit set in the app config. Pass '0' for taking the default limit from app config.

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        public void refresh(ContentLoaderInterface.OnRefreshListener refreshListener)
        Description copied from interface: ContentLoaderInterface
        Refresh content in cache. If database is empty, loads from server. If content is outdated, starts download from server. If content URL has changed (e.g. locale changed) the cached content is automatically cleared and download is started.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface ContentLoaderInterface<Content extends ContentInterface>
        Parameters:
        refreshListener - asynchronous callback reporting result of refresh

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Description copied from interface: ContentLoaderInterface
        Remove all cached content of given content loader
        Specified by:
        clearCache in interface ContentLoaderInterface<Content extends ContentInterface>

      • getStatus

        public ContentLoaderInterface.STATE getStatus()
        Description copied from interface: ContentLoaderInterface
        Get current state of content loader
        Specified by:
        getStatus in interface ContentLoaderInterface<Content extends ContentInterface>
        Returns:
        state NOT_INITIALIZED: database is empty INITIALIZING: database is empty, loading data from server CACHED_DATA_AVAILABLE: database ready for use, content up to date CACHED_DATA_OUTDATED: database ready for use, content is outdated refresh should be called REFRESHING: database ready for use, content is outdated, refresh is in progress CONFIGURATION_ERROR: database is empty, configuration of content loader is incorrect: unknown service ID or improper content class type
